_sText:
A maddened extremist group takes over a rural town's water treatment facility. They have also taken a civilian hostage. 

Counter-Terrrorists: Your mission is to elliminate the terrorist threat and bring the hotage to safety.

Terrorists: Stop the Couter-Terrorists!



The battle will be fast paced and intense. Use flashbang and smoke grenades to their full affect. If the battle is raging on one side, fall back, re-assess, and flank the other side.
